description:
A dead simple Wii backup manager.


What's Changed
- 🐛 Fix larger apps not installing by @mq1 in #205
- ⚡️ Lazy load titles by @mq1 in #206
- 🚸 Show the scroll bar when mouse is over the scroll view by @mq1 in #209
- 🚸 Improve font rendering by @mq1 in #210
- 🚸 Improve dialog UX by @mq1 in #211
- 🐛 Fix occasional freezing by @mq1 in #212
- ✨ Add filtering by console by @mq1 in #213
- 🚸 Text rendering improvements by @mq1 in #214
- 🐛 Fix scrollbars clipping and missing icons by @mq1 in #215
- ⚡️ Build with skia by @mq1 in #216
- 👷 Update ci by @mq1 in #217
- 🐛 Fixes by @mq1 in #218
Full Changelog: 3.0.0...3.0.1
